attributes.action: Only Allow Palm Oil In Products IF it's from a sustainable source
attributes.additional_details: over 2 football pitches A SECOND are being destroyed for collection products like palm oil. Over 150 species of animal and 25 orangutans are being killed because of this. If we used sustainable sources, we would be saving the planet.
attributes.background: Trees are being chopped down, killing over 150 species of animals a day to get palm oil from trees. These are used in many products but harms environment. Only palm oil from sustainable sources should be allowed in products.
